titles.title: American Burying Beetle Relief Act of 2014
A bill to remove the American burying beetle from the list of endangered species under the Endangered Species Act (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.).
American Burying Beetle Relief Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: American Burying Beetle Relief Act of 2014 - Removes the United States Fish and Wildlife Service's listing of the American burying beetle as an endangered species under the Endangered Species Act. Prohibits the beetle from being listed as a threatened or endangered species.
